page.title: 16ROADS
page.content: Although the edge of our area is within one mile of the M5 Motorway,we do not have access to the motorway junctions and travel 5 miles either north or south to Junctions 26 or 27. Almost all of the roads in our area are single track and this means that even small cars have to reverse for each other.If buses meet farm trailers this can cause quite a traffic holdup. Drivers are usually very careful and travel slowly,but sometimes we find that people who do not know the roads travel too fast and there have been a number of accidents in the last year or so.Sometimes tractors and cows pull mud out of fields on to the lanes and this means that we have to be very careful.
